item.title: Intro
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-pink); } The Epilogue of the Epoch of Rest ðŸª´ GUIDE Introduction ðŸŒº This article is about Hobart’s utopia, called Vekllei 1. What is this project? # Utopia has a lot of definitions, but in the end it’s about what it feels like. It has to be genuine, otherwise it just becomes genre storytelling. So utopia is about what feels right by the metrics of one person; an expression of worldview.

item.title: Characters

Overview # This article is still under construction (as of mid-December) but should be done by the end of the month. Thanks for your understanding. In the meantime, I encourage you to visit some of the other sections of this website.
